Well, there are hundreds of free article spinners you can find online. And they of course create unique copy of any content you throw at them. But you know what? For instance, if you throw a sentence at them like “Once I finish reading this book, I will open my laptop and book a hotel for our next trip” Now, you and I can easily understand that word “book” here has different means. But those free “spinners” don’t. And guess what? When you use them to spin this sentence, well ——— you will get a unique copy of it for sure, but it will make no sense. So, free article-spinners are available all over the internet, but to be honest, they are not worth using. Sure if you have enough time to spin an article manually, and you need a little help of spinners, then they are a good fit.
